Title: Magnavale opens Category 3 frozen storage facility in Lincolnshire
Summary:
Magnavale has opened a dedicated Category 3 frozen storage facility at its Easton site in Lincolnshire, UK, increasing the company’s national capacity for storing non-human consumption goods.
